Texts.Chs: 太阳能发电板可以生成电力，而这正是其他用电设备所需要的。接下来，请制作一个^orange;电池组 I^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Solar panels generate power, and most other stations built here require that power to operate. Next, build the ^orange;1000 4v Battery Unit^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 恭喜，你制造出了^orange;电子设备制造机^reset;！你^green;终于^reset;可以做出某些更高级的设备了。快做一个^orange;交流发电机^reset;吧！
Texts.Eng: You've built an ^orange;Electronics Center^reset;! Now you can ^green;truly^reset; start doing some advanced stuff. Start by building an ^orange;Alternator generator^reset;.
